trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: 向 UI 自动化公开 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> 类型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewItemAutomationPeer" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewItemAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewItemAutomationPeer" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The data item that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 与 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer" /> 关联的数据项。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer" /> for a data item in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView" />.
trans-unit.target: 为此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> 集合中的数据项创建 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer" /> 的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer" /> for <paramref name="item" />.
trans-unit.target: 针对 <paramref name="item" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer" /> 的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The item to get an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> for.
trans-unit.target: 需要获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> 的项。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> for the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定对象的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> for the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 指定对象的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewItemAutomationPeer" /> 的控件类型。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.TreeItem" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.TreeItem" /> 枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewItemAutomationPeer" /> 的子元素的集合。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: The collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: 子元素的集合。

trans-unit.source: This method is recursive.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是递归的。

trans-unit.source: That is, it returns the hierarchy of child objects of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，它返回的子对象的层次结构<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewItemAutomationPeer" /> 的名称。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains "TreeViewItem".
trans-unit.target: 包含“TreeViewItem”的字符串。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewItemAutomationPeer" /> 的控件模式。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ScrollItem" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SelectionItem" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, this method returns the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewItemAutomationPeer" />; otherwise, it returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="patternInterface" /> 为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ScrollItem" />、<see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SelectionItem" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />，则此方法返回 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewItemAutomationPeer" /> 的当前实例；否则，它返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此类型或成员支持 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基础结构，但不可直接在代码中使用。
